snippet: Calling American innovation “the envy of the world,” more than 140 tech leaders let out a collective howl at what a Trump presidency might do to tech....
abstract: Group of over 140 tech entrepreneurs and executives publish online letter opposing Donald Trump's campaign for presidency and arguing that his policy proposals will harm innovation.
lead_paragraph: Calling American innovation “the envy of the world,” more than 140 tech leaders let out a collective howl at what a Trump presidency might do to tech.

headline.main: Silicon Valley Writes a Protest Letter Against Trump
headline.print_headline: More Than 140 in Silicon Valley Sign a Scathing Letter Against a Trump Presidency
